statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT item_description FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_price < 50.00;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT item_price, item_quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, item_quantity ASC, item_price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT item_name, item_description, item_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 5 AND item_price < 50 ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT item_name AS product, item_description AS description, item_price * 1.2 AS new_price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity >= 10
SELECT DISTINCT item_name, item_description FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY item_name
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, SUM(item_price) AS total_price FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_price > 10000 ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM ClothingItems WHERE in_stock = true;
SELECT * FROM ClothingItems ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM ClothingItems WHERE item_price < 50;
SELECT item_name, in_stock FROM ClothingItems WHERE item_price >= 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM ClothingItems JOIN StockLevels ON ClothingItems.item_id = StockLevels.item_id WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM ClothingItems WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ClothingItems WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_price DESC
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM ClothingItems JOIN StockLevels ON ClothingItems.item_id = StockLevels.item_id WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, item_price, stock_quantity FROM ClothingItems JOIN StockLevels ON ClothingItems.item_id = StockLevels.item_id WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(item_price) AS total_cost FROM ClothingItems
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items;
SELECT * FROM stock_movements WHERE movement_type = 'IN';
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_location, manager_name FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_capacity > 1000;
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM clothing_items ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY item_price DESC
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_capacity >= 1000 AND manager_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT movement_id, movement_type, movement_date, quantity_affected FROM stock_movements WHERE movement_type = 'IN' ORDER BY movement_date DESC

SELECT c.item_name, w.warehouse_location, s.movement_type, s.quantity_affected FROM clothing_items c JOIN stock_movements s ON c.item_id = s.item_id JOIN warehouses w ON s.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE c.item_category = 'Dresses' AND s.movement_type = 'OUT'
SELECT * FROM ClothingItems WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT item_name, color, size FROM ClothingItems WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, brand, price FROM ClothingItems WHERE brand = 'Nike' AND color = 'Black';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClothingItems WHERE size='M' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, brand, color FROM ClothingItems WHERE brand='Nike' AND color='Black';
SELECT c.first_name, c.lastjson_name, o.total_amount FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.id = o.id WHERE o.status='Shipped';
SELECT ci.item_name, ci.size, sl.stock_location, sl.quantity_available FROM ClothingItems ci JOIN StockLevels sl ON ci.id = sl.item_id WHERE ci.quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM ClothingItems WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price < 50.00
SELECT item_name, item_color FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_color ASC
SELECT item_category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM clothing_items GROUP BY item_category
SELECT item_name, item_size, stock_quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category = 'Shirts';
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_color, item_size FROM clothing_items WHERE item_color = 'Red' AND item_size IN ('M', 'L') ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_phone) >= 10 ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount, payment_status FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
